snippet: After a three-game sweep of the Athletics, the Angels are two and a half games behind Oakland for one of the two American League wild card spots.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column notes that after a three-game sweep of the Oakland Athletics, the Los Angeles Angels are two and a half games behind Oakland for one of the two American League wild card spots.
lead_paragraph: After a three-game sweep of the Athletics, the Angels are two and a half games behind Oakland for one of the two American League wild card spots.

headline.seo: Angels Continue Turnaround With Sweep of the Athletics
headline.main: Angels Continue Turnaround With Sweep of the Athletics
headline.print_headline: Angels Continue Turnaround With Sweep of the Athletics
